text:
Created attachment 26922
Sample FO file showing the issue

See attached file. The paragraph should not be split over two pages as page 2 has enough space to accommodate it entirely.

The problem comes from a combination of changing-ipd, block-container, and keep-with-next set on the last block of the document.
